category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_4gd_unregister_on_delete
preference.preference_description: Activates the Object Directory Services (ODS) un-registration of 4th Generation Design (4GD) objects at the time of object deletion. The ODS registry feature prevents the creation of duplicate objects across federated multi-sites. Valid Values: - true: Allows 4GD objects to be unregistered at the time of deletion. - false: Prevents 4GD objects to be unregistered at the time of deletion.
